name: Anger
description:
Have you ever felt yourself just loose control in an instant? Felt a sudden rush of fear, anxiety, anger or sadness just about to come to surface? This piece is about that moment when we feel this surge, but then we pause. The pause gives us space to evaluate and not to act on impulse. In this moment ask oneself, will this matter in 5 years?

1816 × 2000 px loop video by Tosik.
